title: LF players to create a 2018 Competitive team.  Plat 1 or higher *
body:
Hey I'm currently trying to create a League of Legends team which will be competiting in 5v5 competitions. All positions are available except for mid Lane. Competitive experience not necessary but will take priority over amateur players. Plat 1 or higher with some exceptions. I will be acting as a coach/manager.


Add me if you are interested and we can discuss available times ect..  You may try out for the team if you are under P1 but your spot would be unlikely unless you have competitive experience, shot calling strengths ect.


Edit: Add Split Pushen

replies.body: I would add if your ign existed.
i'm good support, I am plat 4 currently but most likely gonna be diamond next season if you are interested
